title: Chocolate Cannoli Cream
introduction: Chocolate Cannoli Cream offers a rich and indulgent twist to the traditional cannoli filling. This creamy blend of ricotta, cocoa, and vanilla is perfect for filling cannoli tubes for a delightful dessert. It also works wonderfully as a filling for layer cakes or cream puffs, ensuring a versatile addition to your recipe collection.

ingredients.ingredient: whole or part-skim ricotta, drained if necessary

instructions.description: In an electric mixer or food processor, combine the ricotta, sugar, cocoa, and vanilla.
Mix until smooth and well blended.

variations.description: To make black-and-white cannoli, fill one side of the cannoli tube with vanilla filling and the other side with this chocolate filling.
